maxResults.label: Max Results
maxResults.help: Maximum number of memory snippets to inject (default: 3)

showScore.label: Show Similarity Score
showScore.help: Show similarity % next to each memory snippet (default: true)

autoCapture.label: Auto Capture
autoCapture.help: Automatically save memorable info from conversations to memory files (default: false)

captureMaxPerRun.label: Max Captures Per Run
captureMaxPerRun.help: Maximum memories to save per conversation (default: 3)

minPromptLength.label: Min Prompt Length
minPromptLength.help: Skip auto-recall for prompts shorter than this (default: 10)
